name: The Exploding Kitten
scope: Create an online version of card game 'Exploding Kitten'. Incorporate an AI for pleyer to play against computer.
description: The Exploding Kitten is an online version of popular card game 'Exploding Kitten'.

name: Kakis
scope: Create a sport meetup app to gather sport buddy.
description: Kakis is a social web application allowing sport enthusiast to find sport buddies who share the similar interest.

name: Handy
scope: Create an online version of card game 'Exploding Kitten'. Incorporate an AI for pleyer to play against computer.
description: Handy is a web application to connect client with the handyman based on region and skills.
